# Having individual lines for subfolders means parallelization during populate_job

# Catalog Sherlock
/scratch/users/ksb/share/jobs/aayush    quantumespresso catalog
/scratch/users/ksb/share/jobs/mstatt    quantumespresso catalog
/scratch/users/ksb/share/jobs/ksb       quantumespresso catalog
/scratch/users/ksb/share/jobs/ksb       gpaw            catalog
/scratch/users/ksb/share/jobs/ksb       vasp            catalog

# Catalog - Copied from other clusters
/scratch/users/ksb/share/suncat_jobs_copy/jobs/aayush quantumespresso catalog
/scratch/users/ksb/share/suncat_jobs_copy/jobs/mstatt quantumespresso catalog
/scratch/users/ksb/share/suncat_jobs_copy/jobs/ksb    quantumespresso catalog

/scratch/users/ksb/share/nersc_jobs_copy              gpaw            catalog
/scratch/users/ksb/share/nersc_jobs_copy              vasp            catalog

/scratch/users/ksb/share/suncat_jobs_copy/jobs/ksb    gpaw            catalog
/scratch/users/ksb/share/suncat_jobs_copy/jobs/ksb    vasp            catalog
